Verses: 1 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Movaabin Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Avan Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avan Edhomudaiya Raajaavin Elumbugalai Neeraaga Suttuppottaane.
2 movaabdhesaththil Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Keeriyoththin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum; Movaabiyar Amaliyodum Aarpparippodum Ekkaala Saththaththodum Saavaargal.
3 nyaayaadhipadhiyai Avargal Naduvil Iraadhapadikku Naan Sangaarampanni, Avanodekooda Avargaludaiya Prabukkalaiyellaam Kondrupoduven Endrukarththar Sollugiraar.

4 melum: Yoodhaavin Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Avargal Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avargal Karththarudaiyavedhaththai Veruththu, Avarudaiya Kattalaigalaik Kaikkollaamal, Thangal Pidhaakkal Pinpatrina Poigalinaal Mosamponaargale.
5 yoodhaavile Naan Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Erusalemin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

6 melum: Isravelin Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Avargaludaiya Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten, Avargal Needhimaanaip Panaththukkum, Eliyavanai Oru Jodu Paadharatchaikkum Vitruppottaargale.

7 avargal Dhariththirarudaiya Thalaiyinmel Mannaivaari Iraiththu, Sirumaiyaanavargalin Vazhiyaip Purattugiraargal; En Parisuththa Naamaththaik Kulaichchalaakkumpadikku Maganum Thagappanum Oru Pennidaththil Pravesikkiraargal.

8 avargal Sagala Peedangalarugilum Adaimaanamaai Vaangina Vasthirangalinmel Paduththukkondu, Thendam Pidikkappattavargaludaiya Madhubaanaththaith Thangal Dhevargalin Kovilile Kudikkiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 naano: Kedhurumarangalaippol Uyaramum, Karvaali Marangalaippol Vairamumaayirundha Emoriyanai Avargalukku Munbaaga Azhiththen; Uyara Irundha Avanudaiya Kaniyaiyum, Thaazha Irundha Avanudaiya Vergalaiyum Azhiththuppottu,
10 neengal Emoriyanudaiya Dhesaththaik Kattikkollumpadikku Ungalai Naan Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Varappanni, Ungalai Naarpadhu Varushamaaga Vanaandharaththile Vazhinadaththi,
11 ungal Kumaararil Silaraith Theerkkadharisigalaagavum Ungal Vaalibaril Silarai Nasareyaraagavum Ezhumbappanninen; Isravel Puththirare, Ippadi Naan Seyyavillaiyaa Endru Karththar Ketkiraar.
12 neengalo Nasareyarukku Dhraatcharasam Kudikkak Koduththu, Theerkkadharisigalai Nokki: Neengal Theerkkadharisananchollavendaam Endru Karpiththeergal.
13 idho, Kodhumaikkattugal Niraibaaramaaga Etrappatta Vandiyil Iruththugiradhupola, Naan Ungalai Neengal Irukkira Sthalaththil Iruththuven.
14 appozhudhu Vegamaanavan Odiyum Pugalidamillai; Balavaan Than Balaththinaal Balappaduvadhumillai; Paraakkiramasaali Than Praananaith Thappuvippadhumillai.
15 villaip Pidikkiravan Nirpadhumillai; Vegamaanavan Than Kaalgalaal Thappippovadhumillai; Kudhiraiyin Mel Erugiravan Than Praananai Ratchippadhumillai.
16 palasaaligalukkulle Dhairiyavaan Annaalile Nirvaaniyaai Odippovaan Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
